product.name: High Speed Remote Control Car
product.description: 2021 Upgraded 1:18 High-Speed RC Car: The newly upgraded 9300 high-speed remote control car has larger tires and newly designed tire threads, which gives it a stronger grip. We have also carefully equipped you with a brush and a drawstring pocket, which will help you keep the RC car tidy and store accessories.
